Apple Repairing Macbooks for Free

21 Feb 2015

If you’re an owner of one of the following Macbook Pros, you can send in your system for a free repair of any video issues you might be having.

  • MacBook Pro (15-inch Early 2011)
  • MacBook Pro (15-inch, Late 2011)
  • MacBook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Mid 2012)
  • Macbook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Early 2013)
  • Macbook Pro (17-inch, Early 2011)
  • Macbook Pro (17-inch, Late 2011) Find more information about the issue and your options to have your system fixed on Apple’s site.
